card.name: Annick, Oathbound
card.text: Whenever another creature you control enters, you gain 1 life. Vigor — As long as you've gained or lost life this turn, you may cast Annick from your graveyard transformed for {2}{B}{G}. --- (Back): Devika, Severed

card.name: Devika, Severed
card.text: --- (Front): Annick, Oathbound

card.name: Terramorphic Expanse
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice Terramorphic Expanse: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

card.name: Aegis of Grace
card.text: Flying, lifelink Prevent all damage that would be dealt to battles you protect. You, battles you control, and other creatures you control have hexproof.

card.name: Speaker of Currents
card.text: Prowess As you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may add pay the chant cost of any number of creatures you control and add those creature's chants to that spell.

card.name: Seed of the Golden Sun
card.text: Once each turn, when an Illusion you control is exiled, you may create a token that's a copy of it. {1}{R}, Discard Seed of the Golden Sun: Create a token that's a copy of target creature you control, except it's an Illusion with haste and "At the beginning of your end step, exile this creature." Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Commander of the Vow
card.text: When Commander of the Vow enters, create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens. Whenever a token you control deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on Commander of the Vow.

card.name: Oathbreaker's Challenge
card.text: Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control. Vigor — Put a +1/+1 counter on the creature you control before it fights if you've gained or lost life this turn

card.name: Surge of Bitter Breath
card.text: Choose one — • Remove all counters from any number of target permanents. You gain life equal to the number of counters removed this way. (This defeats battles that it targets) • Destroy all tokens. You gain life equal to the number of tokens destroyed this way.

card.name: The Forever Heart
card.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color. Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, you may discard a card with equal or greater mana value. If you do, return that creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield with a finality counter on it.

card.name: Herald of the Radiant Banner
card.text: Activated abilities of artifacts cost an additional "Tap an untapped artifact you control" to activate. Exile two cards from your graveyard: Herald of the Radiant Banner becomes an enchantment until end of turn. (It's no longer a creature this turn.)

card.name: Frog of Eternal Gloom
card.text: Flash When Frog of Eternal Gloom enters, return target creature you don't control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Thrice Sealed Blessing
card.text: As long as you control exactly three creatures, creatures you control get +3/+0, have "Ward—Pay 3 life", and can't be blocked except by three or more creatures.

card.name: Gospel of Dominion
card.text: Whenever a creature you control with no abilities deals combat damage to a player or battle, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card until the end of your next turn. Whenever you play a land from exile or cast a spell from exile, create a 1/1 red Berserker creature token.

card.name: Redeemer of Hollowed Flesh
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, target opponent exiles a card from their graveyard. Create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token if they exiled a creature card this way. Create a Treasure token if they exiled a land card this way. If you didn't create a token this way, put a +1/+1 counter on Redeemer of Hollowed Flesh.

card.name: Knight TWI
card.text: Vigilance

card.name: Angel TWI
card.text: Flying

card.name: Warlock TWI
card.text: Prowess

card.name: Zombie TWI
card.text: This creature can't block.

card.name: Everywhere TWI
card.text: This land is every basic land type.

card.name: Treasure TWI
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice this token: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Warlock TWI
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Warlock TWI
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent discards a card.

card.name: Warlock TWI
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain 2 life.

card.name: Warlock TWI
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent loses 2 life.

card.name: Too Late for Grace
card.text: Return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Erase from Existence
card.text: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. If there are four or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, instead you may have its owner put it on the top or bottom of their library.

card.name: Go Blank
card.text: Target player discards two cards. Then exile that player's graveyard.

card.name: Ashes of the Self
card.text: Scry 2, then exile the top two cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards.

card.name: Refusal of the Hollow Gift
card.text: You or target permanent you control gains hexproof until end of turn.

card.name: Crumbling Ruin
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {2}, {T}: Target nonbasic land you don't control and Crumbling Ruin each lose all abilities and gain "{T}: Add one mana of any color."

card.name: Voice of a Fallen Covenant
card.text: Flying Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast for each other Warlock you control. Whenever another Horror you control attacks, you may exile an instant or sorcery card from you graveyard. You may cast a copy of that card. (You still pay its costs.)

card.name: Crucible of the Burning Sun
card.text: If a card or token would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead. At the beginning of your end step, target player exiles a card from their graveyard. If they can't, scry 1.

card.name: Matriarch of Veiled Kin
card.text: Menace Other Horrors and Warlocks you control get +1/+1. When Matriarch of Veiled Kin enters, reveal the top card of your library until you reveal a Horror or Warlock card with mana value 2 or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Blood TWI
card.text: {1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this token: Draw a card.
